description: Visual design tools are, for example, gesture, sketch, drawing, scale model, perspective drawing, photograph, film, video. These include flowcharts, pseudocode, and Nassi-Shneiderman diagrams.

title: Communication Tools
description: Communication tools are the software or hardware that you use to facilitate your communication channels and techniques. They include email, phone, video conferencing, instant messaging, social media, project management.

title: Nazox Structure
description: An administrative organizational structure is a typically hierarchical arrangement of lines of authority. It determines how the roles, power, and responsibilities are assigned, and how the work process flows among different management levels.
